name: Luxurious
victoryScreenHeader:
Obtains all luxury resources
to win!
milestones: Build [The Grand Museum of Luxury Resources]
victoryString: You have obtained all the available luxury resources, and you have built 'The Grand Museum of Luxury Resources' to showcase your luxurious superiority to everyone.
defeatString: You have been defeated, another civilization has proven its superiority over you. From now on, when the world speaks of disgraceful, everyone will think of you.

name: Demographic
victoryScreenHeader:
Make your people happy, and build 'proofs of gratitude' to prove
to win!
victoryString: You have obtained all the proofs gratitude, and you have built 'The Great dirigeants statue' to showcase your happiness superiority to everyone.
defeatString: You have been defeated, another civilization has proven its superiority over you. From now on, when the world speaks of sadness, everyone will think of you.

name: Religious
victoryScreenHeader:
Gain 50% of your religion followers
in every city of the world!
victoryString: You have achieved victory through the power of faith and conviction. All the nations have submitted to your teachings, for better or worse. Rejoice! For your faith has converted the world.
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Historical
victoryScreenHeader:
Explore the world, discover the secrets of the ruins, and fight barbarians
to win!
victoryString: You have obtained all the proofs gratitude, and you have built 'The Great dirigeants statue' to showcase your happiness superiority to everyone.
defeatString: You have been defeated, another civilization has proven its superiority over you. From now on, when the world speaks of sadness, everyone will think of you.
